function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of germicidal emitters to ensure they are functioning properly. use of air purification technologies to remove harmful by-products from the air.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of precise and controlled humidification systems, regular measurement and monitoring of humidity levels.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of energy-efficient air conditioning systems, regular maintenance and filter replacement, optimization of ventilation systems.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use reliable calculation methods and consider energy-efficient uv tube models.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluate energy sources based on their environmental impact and prioritize renewable and low-emission options.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough research to determine the optimal operating parameters for the uv-c fluorescent system","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collect measurements and diagnostic data on operation during summer and winter to inform the efficient and effective design of the uv-c system","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct simulation calculations with an hourly step to determine the required indoor air parameters for summer and winter","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of air conditioning ducts, use of air filters, and monitoring of environmental conditions","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of protective tubes made of quartz glass, implementation of ip 55 or higher protection, regular inspection and maintenance","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of air flow sensors with uv-c system, automatic shut-off or output reduction when air flow stops","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough analysis of operating environments and conditions to optimize uv-c system design","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilize fluorescent lamps with amalgam technology for temperature stabilization","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Design fluorescent lamps with smaller dimensions and higher specific power per cm2 of lamp body area","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of amalgam technology to stabilize temperature and extend effective life, control operating power to maintain uv-c performance","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of controllable high-frequency ballast, regulation of operating power during lamp life, use of amalgam technology","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulation of operating power, use of energy-efficient technologies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and regulation of the uv-c system according to manufacturer’s guidelines","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of controllable high-frequency ballast and regular monitoring of uv-c system performance","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement automated monitoring system for uv-c system operating hours and power output","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance, cleaning, and replacement of uv-c lamps. control of air temperature and dust pollution. monitoring and maintenance of reflective surfaces in ventilation ducts.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance, timely lamp replacement, and environmental monitoring.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper shielding and interlocks to ensure uv-c lamps are off during maintenance. warning signs and training for maintenance personnel.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance schedule, performance monitoring, replacement of uv-c lamps according to manufacturer’s guidelines.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper design analysis of uv-c system for optimal radiation distribution, use of computational fluid dynamics cfd for airflow analysis.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement air disinfection measures using uv-c radiation","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough research to determine appropriate uv-c doses for different pathogens","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop customized uv-c treatment strategies for different pathogens and environments","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing additional air disinfection measures alongside uv-c radiation","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of glass that absorbs uv-c radiation of 185 nm for air disinfection lamps","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoiding direct exposure of humans and sensitive materials to uv-c radiation","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate the use of germicidal irradiation into building operational measures","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expand the use of germicidal irradiation in civil buildings","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct research to assess the current use of germicidal irradiation in slovakia","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize hvac systems for energy efficiency, consider alternative ventilation methods","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Review assumptions, consider alternative energy-saving measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement energy-saving measures, optimize building design for ventilation efficiency","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing measures to reduce the risk of infection in the interiors.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploring alternative ways to reduce the risk of infection in indoor environments.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing hvac system modifications to prevent heat stress and improve indoor air quality.","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular testing, isolation of symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection, improved ventilation systems","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage responsible use of green spaces, enforce social distancing measures, and promote outdoor activities with low transmission risk","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote responsible outdoor activities, enforce gathering restrictions, and provide safe outdoor fitness options","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in research and data collection on the impact of urban design on public health, promote the use of urban green infrastructure, and integrate health impact assessments into urban planning","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Equitable distribution of green space, inclusive design and management, and community engagement in local planning processes.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement crowd control measures, enforce social distancing guidelines, limit the capacity of green spaces","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educate the public about responsible use of green spaces, provide alternative local recreational opportunities, and promote off-peak usage","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further work to calibrate relative differences between cycling and pedestrian activities","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop and implement systems for distinguishing between cyclists and pedestrians in ground-truth reference counters","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"}]}
